channel.title: My IP changes everytime i restart! Help!?
channel.description:
Ok, i have a server that i set up, people can play it untill i restart my computer because my IP changes (im using a laptop)
I went to dyndns.org to change the IP for my hostname but still i cant get on my server (because i restarted my comp)
Someone please help

no, everytime ichange when i restart it doesnt work either

@maximum wrote:

well its kinda happens to me too but when i log off the internet it changes adn are sure ur using ur laptops ip? not internet proxy cause i have aol and evert time i loging to no-ip.com my current ip changes i solved the problem by going on to internet explorer and in the adress bar i went to " www.myip.se " and that should be ur current ip the whole time or untill u get off the internet try that it might work

item.source: My IP changes everytime i restart! Help!?

item.title: My IP changes everytime i restart! Help!?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Look
I have NOT got a router
I have a data moderm that connects to your computer via USB and then you buy top up cards when you ant to use the internet. - Like a mobile phone that hasnt got contract

Before reading the next bit bear in mind my IP changes everyday so i edit the IP everyday.
I have a no-ip that doesnt work ( i have ticked the box so the smiley face comes up)
I have a dyndns too that doesnt work
I change my IP everytime i restart (change the hostname) - Because my IP changes everytime i restart

Read full topic

item.source: My IP changes everytime i restart! Help!?

item.title: My IP changes everytime i restart! Help!?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

How do i set a static IP?

ibby:

use ur router ip

I dont have a router …

KingKj52:

This happens to me to, but I found a quick and easy answer. Others connect through the No-IP or IP, and you connect through your LAN IP. In other words, this is mine for an example for others they type ScapeForFun.no-ip.biz, but for me I type 192.168.2.3. Always works. Try it ^^.

Already have

Read full topic

I set up a no-ip account
I made a server IP
I waited for around 5 mins
I downloaded DUC v2.21
I then ticked the box for my server (On DUC v2.21)
Now, when i try to connect it says ’ error connecting to server’

  • I dont get this change IP thing
